com.communote.server.core.mail.fetching

Class MailFetchingService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.mail.fetching.MailFetchingService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommunoteService, CommunoteSingletonService

    public class MailFetchingService
extends Object
implements CommunoteSingletonService
    Service that fetches e-mails from an external server and creates notes.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      • start

        public void start(boolean triggeredLocally)
        Non-blocking function that starts the service. It is not checked whether the service is enabled. The caller should do this.
        Specified by:
        start in interface CommunoteService
        Parameters:
        triggeredLocally - true if the service was triggered on this Communote instance, false if it was triggered by an event from another Communote instance when running a clustered setup

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the service and returns after the service was stopped. If the service is not running nothing must happen.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface CommunoteService

      • supportsRestart

        public boolean supportsRestart()
        Returns whether the service can be restarted at runtime. False should be returned if a restart would lead to loss of data.
        Specified by:
        supportsRestart in interface CommunoteService
        Returns:
        true if the service can be restarted when it is already running.
